name: get_animes

year_equal.description: Filter by animes released in the specified year.

source.description: Filter by source material (e.g., manga, visual_novel, novel, etc.).

drive.description: Drive transmission. Possible values include 'fwd' (front-wheel drive), 'rwd' (rear-wheel drive), 'awd' (all-wheel drive), '4wd' (four-wheel drive).

max_comb_mpg.description: Maximum combined (city + highway) fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

transmission.description: Type of transmission. Possible values include 'manual', 'automatic'.

min_hwy_mpg.description: Minimum highway fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

cylinders.description: Number of cylinders. Possible values include 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16.

tbs.description: The time-based search parameters (e.g., 'qdr:d' for past 24 hours). Defaults to None.

num.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to 20.

start.description: The index of the first result to return. Defaults to None.

hl.description: The language of the search results (e.g., 'en'). Defaults to None.

description: Adds two binary numbers and returns the result as a binary string.

pagesize.description: The number of news articles to retrieve per page. Default is 20, maximum is 20.

currentnewsid.description: The ID of the last news article returned in the previous request. Pass 0 for the first query. Default is 0.

description: Fetches the live price of a stock by its symbol.

description: Fetches the latest news and stories from different sources.

description: Fetches the albums of a specified artist from the Spotify API using the provided RapidAPI key.

to_symbol.description: A 3-letter currency code or symbol (ISO 4217) representing the target currency (e.g., 'EUR').

language.description: The language of the news results, specified as a 2-letter language code (ISO 639-1). Default is 'en'.

name: cpf
description: Fetches information of a partner or administrator based on their CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas).

description: Reverses the order of words in a sentence.

num_sides.description: The number of sides on the die. Defaults to 6.

name: calculate_order_total

prices.description: A list of corresponding prices for each item.

name: validate_email

first_name.description: First name(s) of the individual. Defaults to 'Gener'.

last_name.description: Last name(s) of the individual. Defaults to 'Garcia Molina'.

name: flatten_list

pair_slug.description: Trading pair presentation or pool contract address. Examples include `ETH-USDC`, `eth-usdc`, `WETH-USDC`, `USDC-WETH`, or a pool contract address.

name: get_last_5_news
description: Fetches the last 5 news articles from the financial section.

content_type.description: The type of content to retrieve (e.g., 'application/json').

name: topic
description: Fetches topics from the Quotes Diffusion API with optional pagination and search functionality.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to None.

search.description: Custom search term to filter topics. Defaults to None.

name: stocks_get_financials
description: Fetches financial information related to a stock ticker or symbol.

symbol.description: The stock exchange and ticker symbol in the format "exchange:symbol" (e.g., "NASDAQ:TSLA").

columns.description: A comma-separated list of financial metrics to retrieve (e.g., "ADR,ADX,average_volume").

screenername.description: The screener name field value as returned by the /countries/list endpoint. Defaults to 'america'.

lang.description: The language code for the returned data. Defaults to 'en'.

name: search_leaderboard
description: Search the Binance Futures leaderboard based on various criteria.

statisticstype.description: The statistics type to filter the leaderboard.

periodtype.description: The period type to filter the leaderboard.

tradetype.description: The trade type to filter the leaderboard. 'PERPETUAL' represents USDⓈ-M, and 'DELIVERY' represents COIN-M.

name: search_on_ebay
description: Searches for items on eBay using the provided search query and RapidAPI key.

searchquery.description: The search term used to look for items on eBay.

name: get_countries
description: Fetches a list of countries based on various search criteria.

keyword.description: Search countries by keyword. Defaults to 'ind'.

perpage.description: Number of results per page. Defaults to 50.

is_id.description: Filter countries by country ID.

page.description: Number of results per page. Defaults to 50.

name: local_weather_api
description: Fetches local weather data using the World Weather Online API.

q.description: Location query (city name, town name, or geographic coordinates).

tp.description: Time interval between weather updates (e.g., '1' for hourly updates). Defaults to None.

aqi.description: Whether to include Air Quality Index data ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'yes'.

format.description: Response format (e.g., 'json' or 'xml'). Defaults to None.

lang.description: Language for the output. Defaults to 'en'.

alerts.description: Whether to include weather alerts ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'no'.

num_of_days.description: Number of days for the weather forecast. Defaults to 3.

name: news_latest_page
description: Fetches the latest news stories in chronological order, filtered by the specified page ID.

page_id.description: The identifier for the specific news page to filter the stories.

name: calculate_grade
description: Calculates the weighted average grade based on scores and their corresponding weights.

weights.description: A list of weights corresponding to each score.

name: stock_get_stock_profile_data
description: Fetches the stock profile data for a specified ticker symbol and region.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock (e.g., "AAPL" for Apple Inc.).

region.description: The region in which the stock is listed. Default is 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.

name: stock_get_dividends_splits
description: Fetches stock dividends and splits data for a given ticker ID using the Webull API.

tickerid.description: The ticker ID of the stock for which to fetch dividends and splits data. This is the value of the tickerId field returned from endpoints such as /stock/search, /market/get-common-ranking, /market/get-top-active, and /market/get-top-gainers.

name: search_emails
description: Search the web for email addresses based on a specified email domain and query.

email_domain.description: The email domain to search within (e.g., wsgr.com, gmail.com).

query.description: The search query to use, which can include names, job titles, locations, etc.

limit.description: The maximum number of emails to return. Defaults to 100. Accepts values from 1 to 5000.

name: email_validate
description: Validate a single email address in real-time using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: email_verifier
description: Verifies the validity of an email address using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

name: check_for_disposable_emails
description: Checks if the given email address is disposable or temporary using the Email Existence Validator API.

email.description: The email address to check for disposability.

name: latest_articles
description: Fetches the latest cryptocurrency news articles from the web, including sentiment analysis and keyword extraction.

subject.description: The subject of the news articles (e.g., bitcoin, altcoin, ethereum, nft, blockchain, defi).

top_n_keywords.description: The number of keywords to extract from each article (default is 10).

max_articles.description: The maximum number of articles to retrieve in response (default is 10).

last_n_hours.description: The time window in hours for the latest news articles (default is 48 hours).

name: list_of_room_facility_types
description: Fetches a list of room facility types from the Booking.com API based on given criteria.

room_facility_type_id.description: ID of the specific room facility type to filter.

facility_type_id.description: ID of the specific room facility type to filter.

name: is_hotel_available
description: Checks the availability of a hotel for a given date range.

city.description: The city where the hotel is located.

checkin.description: The check-in date in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

checkout.description: The check-out date in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

name: get_current_weather
description: Retrieves the current weather for a specified city using the Cloud Cast API.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the weather.

name: get_by_latin_name
description: Retrieves information about plants that match the provided Latin plant name using the House Plants API.

latin_name.description: The Latin name of the plant to search for. Defaults to 'philodendron'. This parameter accepts only [a-zA-Z] characters.

name: game_lookup
description: Fetches detailed information for a specific game from the CheapShark API, including a list of all deals associated with the game.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the game to look up.

name: stock_get_stat
description: Retrieves stock statistics for a given ticker ID from the Webull API.

tickerid.description: The value of the ticker ID to fetch statistics for. This ID can be obtained from other endpoints such as /stock/search or /market/get-common-ranking.

name: get_5_year_historical_monthly_prices
description: Fetch 5-year historical monthly stock prices for a given ticker symbol.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which historical data is to be fetched.

name: basic_daily
description: Fetch daily 10-Q and 10-K report zip files from the SEC financial statement dataset.

date.description: The specific date for which to fetch the daily zip file, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: email_qr_code
description: Creates and returns a static QR code encoded with the provided email address. The QR code can be customized with various design parameters such as background color, eye pattern, error correction level, size, data gradient colors, and data patterns. When scanned, the QR code will prompt the user to send an email to the specified address.

address.description: The email address to encode in the QR code.

background_color.description: The background color of the QR code. Defaults to '#FFFFFF'.

eye_pattern.description: The pattern of the QR code eyes. Defaults to 'RECT_RECT'.

error_correction.description: The error correction level of the QR code. Defaults to 'M'.

size.description: The size of the QR code. Defaults to 'm'.

data_gradient_start_color.description: The starting color for the data gradient. Defaults to '#000000'.

data_gradient_style.description: The style of the data gradient. Defaults to 'None'.

data_pattern.description: The pattern for the QR code data. Defaults to 'RECT'.

eye_color_outer.description: The outer color of the QR code eyes. Defaults to '#000000'.

data_gradient_end_color.description: The ending color for the data gradient. Defaults to '#000000'.

eye_color_inner.description: The inner color of the QR code eyes. Defaults to '#000000'.

name: convert_date
description: Convert a date to a specified calendar format using the Calendar Converter API.

to.description: The target calendar format to which the date will be converted. Possible values are:

date.description: The date to be converted, in "yyyy-mm-dd" format. Default is '1986-09-03'.

is_from.description: The calendar format of the input date. If not specified, the input date is assumed to be in Gregorian format.

name: current_weather_data_of_a_location
description: Fetch the current weather data for a given location based on longitude and latitude.

lat.description: The latitude of the location.

name: top_players_by_matchmaking
description: Fetch the top players by their matchmaking rank from the TrackMania API.

limit.description: The number of results to be returned. Default is `50`.

page.description: The page number for the results, each containing 50 results. Default is `0`.

name: get_ip_zipcode
description: Retrieves the ZIP code of a given IP address using the ip-api.com API.

name: find_kth_smallest_number
description: Finds the kth smallest number in a list.

k.description: The position (1-based index) of the smallest number to find.

name: domain_seo_analysis
description: Fetch popular SEO metrics for a specified domain name, optionally considering the search from a specific country's perspective.

domain.description: The domain name to analyze for SEO metrics.

country.description: Specify the proxy location for the search. Supported countries include 'US', 'CA', 'IE', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE', 'SE', 'IN', 'JP', 'KR', 'SG', 'AU', 'BR'. Defaults to 'us'.

name: get_order
description: Retrieves the details of an order by making a GET request to the RapidAPI store.

is_id.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

name: search_for_creators
description: Search for creators on Patreon using the given search query.

search_query.description: The search term used to query creators on Patreon.

name: get_content
description: Retrieves the content from the given URL using the RapidAPI service.

url.description: The URL of the webpage from which to extract content.

name: sticker_search
description: Searches for animated stickers on Giphy using a search query and optional parameters.

q.description: Search query term or phrase.

limit.description: Number of results to return, with a maximum of 100. Defaults to 25.

offset.description: Results offset, defaults to 0.

rating.description: Limit results to those rated (y, g, pg, pg-13, or r).

name: search_searchterm
description: Search for a term using the Uncovered Treasure API and return the results.

searchterm.description: The term to search for, e.g., "God's plan".

callback.description: An optional JSONP callback parameter for the API request.

name: event_data
description: Fetches event data for a given event ID using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

event_id.description: The unique identifier for the event.

name: basic_search
description: Performs a basic search for movie news articles using the `/news/basic/search` endpoint.

q.description: The query term for the search, typically a keyword related to movie news.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before returning results. Default is 0.

name: stock_balance_sheet_stock
description: Fetches the balance sheet data for a given stock symbol using the mboum-finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve balance sheet data.

name: search_for_a_champion
description: Search for a League of Legends champion based on various criteria and return the champion data.

name.description: Name of the champion. Default is 'zed'.

rp.description: Riot Points cost of the champion.

blueessence.description: Blue Essence cost of the champion.

name: categories_list
description: Fetches a list of categories and their recursive child categories from the Wayfair API.

caid.description: The category ID for which to list categories. The default root category is 214970.

name: search_shops
description: Search for shops using a specified keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for shops.

lan.description: The language of the website to search (default is None). For instance, "en" for English or "cn" for Chinese.

page.description: The page number of search results (default is 1).

pagesize.description: The number of results per page (default is 10).

name: list_of_cities_in_one_country
description: Fetches the list of cities in a specified country via the Weather Forecast API.

lang.description: The language in which the city names should be returned. Defaults to 'en'. Supported languages include 'en', 'fr', 'pl', 'pt', 'es', 'it', 'gr', 'tr', 'ru', 'cn', 'cz'.

country.description: The country code for which the cities should be listed. Defaults to 'UK'.

name: daily
description: Fetches the daily weather forecast for the next 21 days using Meteosource's AI technology.

language.description: The language of text summaries. Available options are:

units.description: The unit system for the forecast data. Available options are:

lon.description: Longitude in various formats like 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4. Alternatively, use the `place_id` parameter. Defaults to '-122.42282'.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place obtained from Location endpoints. Alternatively, use `lat` and `lon` parameters. Defaults to None.

lat.description: Latitude in various formats like 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4. Alternatively, use the `place_id` parameter. Defaults to '37.81021'.

name: searchfollowers
description: Search the followers of a specific Instagram user based on a query.

user_id.description: The ID of the Instagram user whose followers will be searched.

query.description: The search query to filter the followers.

name: search_by_engine
description: Search for airplanes that have engines matching the given keyword.

engine_icontains.description: Keyword to search for in the airplane engine descriptions.

name: get_math_fact
description: Fetch a mathematical property or fact about a given number.

number.description: The number for which the mathematical fact is to be retrieved.

fragment.description: If set to 'True', returns the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included in a larger sentence. Defaults to 'True'.

json.description: If set to 'True', returns the result in JSON format instead of plaintext. Defaults to 'True'.

name: search_music
description: Searches for music based on the provided keywords using the TikTok API.

keywords.description: The search terms to look for in the music database.

count.description: The number of results to return, with a maximum of 30. Defaults to 5.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to get the next set of results. Defaults to None.

name: future_investment_value
description: Calculates the future value of an investment based on the present value, annual interest rate, and number of years.

present_value.description: The present value of the investment.

annual_interest_rate.description: The annual interest rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.05 for 5%).

years.description: The number of years the investment will grow.

name: nearest_place
description: Searches for the nearest named place (village, town, or city) from given GPS coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude in formats like "12N", "12.3N", "12.3", "13S", "13.2S", or "-13.4".

language.description: The language for the place names. Available options are:

name: tokens
description: Retrieves a list of tokens and their contract information based on the specified blockchain network.

network.description: The name of the blockchain network. Supported networks include arbitrum, aurora, avalanche, bsc, cronos, ethereum, fantom, harmony, heco, kcc, metis, moonriver, oasisemerald, optimism, polygon, and telos.

name: sort_numbers
description: Sorts a list of numbers in ascending or descending order.

numbers.description: The list of numbers to be sorted.

descending.description: If True, sorts the numbers in descending order. Defaults to False.

name: is_rotation
description: Checks if one string is a rotation of another string.

name: hotels_search
description: Searches for available hotels based on the provided filters and parameters.

order_by.description: Criteria to order the search results.

adults_number.description: Number of adults for the hotel booking.

checkin_date.description: Check-in date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dest_id.description: Destination ID for the hotel search.

checkout_date.description: Check-out date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

units.description: Measurement units to use (e.g., metric or imperial).

dest_type.description: Type of the destination (e.g., city, hotel, etc.).

include_adjacency.description: Whether to include hotels in nearby locations. Defaults to None.

children_number.description: Number of children for the hotel booking. Defaults to 2.

page_number.description: Page number for paginated results. Defaults to 0.

children_ages.description: Comma-separated ages of the children. Defaults to '5,0'.

categories_filter_ids.description: IDs for filtering search categories. Defaults to 'class::2,class::4,free_cancellation::1'.

name: players
description: Fetches information about a PGA Tour player based on provided search parameters such as last name, first name, or player ID.

lastname.description: The last name of the player. Default is 'Morikawa'.

playerid.description: The ID of the player. Default is '50525'.

firstname.description: The first name of the player. Default is 'Collin'.

name: get_date_fact
description: Fetches a fact about a specific day of the year from the Numbers API.

fragment.description: Adds "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment. Defaults to 'True'.

json.description: Specify "true" to return the result as JSON instead of plaintext. Defaults to 'True'.

name: get_random_quote
description: Fetches a random quote from an API, with an option to limit the length of the quote.

limit.description: Maximum length of the quote in characters. Defaults to 50.

name: timezones
description: Fetch a list of the world's time zones with various filtering options.

offset.description: Filter on non-daylight savings offset in hours.

name.description: Filter as "contains" on timezone name in the chosen language.

code.description: Filter on 3-letter non-daylight savings timezone code (not unique).

timezone.description: Filter on timezone name in English.

daylights_offset.description: Filter on daylight savings offset in hours.

lang.description: Language selection ISO 639-1 two-letter code. Overrides the Accept-Language header. Default is 'de'.

daylights_code.description: Filter on daylight savings letter code (not unique).

fields.description: Select fields to return in the result. Default is 'offset,daylights_offset,daylights,daylights_code,timezone'.

daylights.description: Filter on daylight savings/non-daylight savings time zones (`true` or `false`).

name: trending_tags_from_country
description: Fetches trending tags from a specified country using the Hashtag5 API.

country_name.description: The name of the country for which to fetch trending tags.

name: tweet_detail_conversation
description: Fetches the details and conversation of a tweet using the provided tweet ID and optional cursor.

is_id.description: The ID of the tweet for which details and conversation need to be fetched.

cursor.description: The cursor value for pagination to fetch additional results. Defaults to None.

name: search_translations
description: Fetch a list of translations from the translation memory ranked by quality and similarity.

langpair.description: The language pair in the format `source|target`, using two ISO-639 language codes.

q.description: The text you wish to translate.

onlyprivate.description: If set to '1', only private matches will be returned. Defaults to '0' (disabled).

mt.description: Enables machine translation results. '1' (enabled) is the default, '0' disables it.

de.description: A valid email address, recommended for high volume usage or use with CAT tools. Defaults to 'a@b.c'.

key.description: API key to access private memories and customize API limits.

name: postcodes_postcode
description: Fetches addresses for a given UK postcode using the RapidAPI UK Postcode API.

postcode.description: The UK postcode to look up addresses for.

name: video_comments
description: Fetches a list of comments from a specified YouTube video using the provided RapidAPI key.

video_id.description: The ID of the YouTube video for which to fetch comments.

name: simulate_query_database
description: Simulates querying a database based on certain conditions.

table.description: Name of the table to query.

conditions.description: Conditions for the query, each condition is a dictionary.

name: models_by_make
description: Fetch all motorcycle models by the given make name using the RapidAPI service.

make.description: The name of the motorcycle manufacturer (e.g., 'BMW').

name: street_level_outcomes
description: Fetches street-level outcomes such as crime data for a given location, either at a specific point, within a 1-mile radius, or within a custom area for a specified date.

date.description: The date for which to fetch outcomes, formatted as 'YYYY-MM'.

lat.description: The latitude of the specific location.

lng.description: The longitude of the specific location.

name: phone_number
description: Validates a given phone number using the Phone and Email Validator API from RapidAPI.

phone.description: The phone number to be validated in E164 format (e.g., '19542567890' for USA).

name: can_attend_all_meetings
description: Determines if a person can attend all meetings given a list of meeting time intervals.

intervals.description: A list of meeting time intervals, where each interval is represented as [start_time, end_time].

name: format_date
description: Converts a date string from one format to another.

date.description: The date string to convert.

input_format.description: The format of the input date string.

output_format.description: The desired format of the output date string.

name: search_philosopher_by_name
description: Searches for a philosopher by their name using the specified API key and returns the result.

name.description: The name of the philosopher to search for. Defaults to 'Friedrich Nietzsche'.

name: cities_search
description: Search for cities based on various criteria and return a list of matching cities.

q.description: The query string to search for cities by name.

page.description: The page number of the search results.

country_code.description: The country code to filter the search results.

sortorder.description: The order in which to sort the search results.

sortby.description: The attribute to sort the search results by.

country_name.description: The name of the country to filter the search results.

country_id.description: The ID of the country to filter the search results.

limit.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

state_code.description: The state code to filter the search results.

state_id.description: The ID of the state to filter the search results.

state_name.description: The name of the state to filter the search results.

name: get_beers_by_single_country
description: Fetches the details of a beer from a specified country using the given beer identifier.

beerid.description: The identifier of the beer to fetch details for.

name: more_from_author
description: Fetches more recipes from a specified author using the Worldwide Recipes API.

profile_display_name.description: The display name of the author's profile to retrieve recipes from.

canonical_term.description: The search term or keyword related to the author's recipes.

name: stock_get_financials
description: Fetches financial information for a given stock.

is_id.description: The identifier of the stock. Use the market/auto-complete API to get the correct values.

name: recommendations
description: Fetches analyst recommendations for a given stock symbol, optionally filtered by exchange and country.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to get recommendations for.

exchange.description: Filter recommendations by exchange name or mic code.

country.description: Filter recommendations by country name or alpha code.

name: is_subset
description: Checks if one set is a subset of another set.

name: search_by_title
description: Search for Movies or TV Shows by title, with optional filters for year, media type, and limit on the number of results.

s.description: The title of the Movie or TV Show to search for.

l.description: The maximum number of items to return. Accepts values from 1 to 100. Defaults to None.

y.description: The year to filter the search results (format YYYY). This will also include movies from the previous and next year. Defaults to None.

m.description: Filter by media type, either 'movie' or 'tv show'. Leave empty for both. Defaults to None.

name: count_vowels
description: Counts the number of vowels in a given text.

name: title_cast_crew
description: Fetches and returns the cast and crew information of a given title from the Watchmode API.

is_id.description: The ID of the title. This can be the Watchmode ID, IMDB ID, or a TMDB type and ID combination.

name: greatest_common_divisor
description: Computes the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two non-negative integers.

name: countiessearchinboundingbox
description: Fetch county boundaries within a specified bounding box in GeoJSON format.

northeast.description: Coordinates of the northeast corner of the bounding box (e.g., '40.81,-73.41').

southwest.description: Coordinates of the southwest corner of the bounding box (e.g., '40.62,-74.73').

intersect.description: Whether to include areas that intersect with the bounding box. Default is None.

name: longest_common_prefix
description: Finds the longest common prefix among a list of strings.

name: contacts
description: Fetches the contacts list from a specified WhatsApp instance using the Maytapi API.

phone_id.description: The unique identifier for the phone instance in the Maytapi WhatsApp service.

name: count_occurrences
description: Counts the occurrences of each element in a list and returns a dictionary with the counts.

name: market_auto_complete
description: Fetch auto-complete suggestions for stock market queries.

query.description: The search query for which auto-complete suggestions are needed.

name: news_v2_list_by_symbol
description: Fetches the latest news articles associated with a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve news. This is typically obtained from the auto-complete or other relevant endpoints.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.

pagesize.description: The number of news articles to return per page. Defaults to 30.

name: business_search
description: Search for Yelp businesses by keyword and location, with options for pagination, price range, domain, and sorting order.

location.description: The location to search for businesses (e.g., "New York, NY, USA").

query.description: The search keyword or query (e.g., "Plumbing", "Chinese restaurants").

start.description: The number of results to skip, mainly used for pagination. Default is 0.

price_range.description: Specific price ranges to search for, specified as a comma-delimited list (e.g., "$,$$", "$$")

yelp_domain.description: The Yelp domain to use for the search. Default is 'yelp.com'. Supported domains include 'yelp.com', 'yelp.com.au', 'yelp.co.nz', and others.

sort_by.description: The order to sort the search results by. Default is 'RECOMMENDED'. Allowed values are 'RECOMMENDED', 'HIGHEST_RATED', 'REVIEW_COUNT'.

name: get_from_1337_x
description: Fetches torrent data for a given search topic from the 1337x website using the RapidAPI service.

searchtopic.description: The topic or keywords to search for torrents on 1337x.

name: superfund_search
description: Search for Superfund sites based on provided latitude, longitude, and radius.

radius.description: The radius within which to search for Superfund sites.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate for the center of the search.

lng.description: The longitude coordinate for the center of the search.

name: song_download
description: Downloads a song from the provided SoundCloud URL using the specified RapidAPI key.

track_url.description: The URL of the SoundCloud track to be downloaded.

name: rapidapigethourlyforecastbylocationname
description: Fetches the hourly weather forecast for a given location using the RapidAPI service.

locationname.description: The name of the location for which to retrieve the hourly weather forecast.

name: rapidapigetforecasthourlybycoordinates
description: Gets hourly weather forecast information for given geographical coordinates using the RapidAPI service.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location.

name: get_5_day_3_hour_forecast_data
description: Fetches the 5-day weather forecast data with 3-hour intervals for a specified location.

q.description: The location query in the format "{city name},{country code}". The city name and country code should be divided by a comma, and the country code should follow ISO 3166 standards. Defaults to 'dallas,us'.

name: hourly_forecast_48_hours
description: Fetches a 48-hour weather forecast for the specified latitude and longitude coordinates.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the forecast location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the forecast location.

name: news_list_top
description: Fetches the top news from all supported areas.

symbol.description: The symbol of the quote, market, etc., such as 'IMRN'. Only one is allowed at a time. Defaults to None.

name: top_news
description: Fetches the current top news based on the specified region and language.

region.description: The region for which to fetch the top news. Defaults to 'US'.

hl.description: The language code for the news. Defaults to 'en'.

name: taobao_search_by_keyword
description: Search for products on Taobao using a specified keyword and return the search results.

page.description: The page number to retrieve from the search results.

name: geogrid_seach_with_ranking
description: Perform a full grid search and retrieve the ranking of a business at every coordinate point in the grid. The grid cells in the results are ordered left-to-right, then top-to-bottom. Additional ranking data for the business is provided based on either place ID or business name.

name: list

sort.description: The sorting order of the results. Accepted values are 'sizeasc', 'sizedesc', 'dateasc', 'datedesc', 'fileasc', and 'filedesc'. By default, 'datedesc' is selected.

name: three_hourly

history.description: Whether to include 24 hours of past data. Defaults to None.

tz.description: Time zone in the response, specified using IANA time zone database names. Defaults to 'Europe/London'.

dataset.description: The variable set to use in the response. Defaults to 'full'.

tempunit.description: The temperature unit in the response (e.g., 'C' for Celsius). Defaults to 'C'.

alt.description: The altitude in meters. Defaults to 0.

periods.description: The number of time steps in the response, with a default of 8 and a maximum of 12. Defaults to 8.

windunit.description: The wind speed unit in the response (e.g., 'MS' for meters per second). Defaults to 'MS'.

name: searchcountries

page.description: The page number for pagination.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

sortby.description: The sorting criteria in the format `field:order`, e.g., `name:desc`, `alpha-2:asc`. Use `asc` for ascending order and `desc` for descending order.

name: search_places
description: Fetches a list of places (either countries, cities, or administrative divisions) that match a query and can be filtered by various properties.

type.description: Filters places by `type`. Specifiable values are 'CITY', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_1', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_2', and 'COUNTRY'. Default is 'CITY'.

language.description: Specifies the language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is unavailable, the "localizedName" property will be null.

skip.description: Number of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used with `limit` to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

country.description: Filters places by their country `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US,CA'). Default is 'US,CA'.

limit.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used with `skip` to paginate results. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

admindivision1.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US.CA,US.DE').

admindivision2.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas.

accuracyradiuskm.description: Maximum radius (in kilometers) from the point specified by `latitude` and `longitude` to filter places located within the area. Default is 100 km.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `longitude` is not specified.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `latitude` is not specified.

counter.description: The pagination counter for subsequent requests. Defaults to None for the first request.

after.description: The pagination marker for subsequent requests. Defaults to None for the first request.

description: Fetches a list of stocks having the Falling Three Methods signal from the RapidAPI BarPatterns service.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: get_zip_code_info

country.description: The country code (e.g., 'us' for the United States).

postal_code.description: The postal code for which information is being fetched.

name: brazil_songs
description: Fetches the Brazil Songs chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart data to retrieve.

name: get_profile_data
description: Retrieves profile data from the LinkedIn Profile Data API using a given username.

username.description: The LinkedIn username for which to retrieve profile data.

name: tournament_teams
description: Fetches the list of teams participating in a specific tournament using the provided tournament ID and RapidAPI key.

tournamentid.description: The ID of the tournament for which to retrieve the list of teams.

name: billboard_hot_100
description: Fetches the Billboard Hot 100 chart for a specified week.

week.description: The specific week for which to fetch the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Defaults to '2022-10-08'. The date should be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: screeners_details

name: v1_planets
description: Fetch a list of planets that match the specified parameters. The results are limited to a maximum of 30; use the `offset` parameter for pagination to access more results.

max_period.description: Maximum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

max_temperature.description: Maximum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

max_distance_light_year.description: Maximum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

min_distance_light_year.description: Minimum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

max_mass.description: Maximum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

max_semi_major_axis.description: Maximum semi-major axis of the planet in astronomical units (AU).

min_mass.description: Minimum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

min_semi_major_axis.description: Minimum semi-major axis of the planet in astronomical units (AU).

name.description: Name of the planet. Defaults to 'Mars'.

min_temperature.description: Minimum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

max_radius.description: Maximum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

min_radius.description: Minimum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

min_period.description: Minimum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

name: get_specific_dessert
description: Fetch a specific dessert's details using its ID from the Pizza and Desserts API.

is_id.description: The ID of the dessert to fetch.

name: capture_screenshot
description: Captures a screenshot of the specified website and returns the observation JSON or text from the API response.

url.description: The URL of the website to capture a screenshot of.

name: v1_holidays
description: Fetches holidays for a given year and country using the API Ninjas Holidays endpoint.

year.description: Calendar year between 2010 and 2030 (inclusive). Note: not all countries are guaranteed to have data going back to 2010.

country.description: Country name or ISO 3166-2 country code (preferred).

type.description: Holiday type filter. Possible values include:

name: v1_historicalevents
description: Fetches a list of up to 10 historical events that match the provided search parameters using API Ninjas Historical Events API.

text.description: Query text to search events by. Use keywords or short phrases for best match results. Defaults to 'roman empire'.

month.description: Integer representing the month (e.g., 3 for March). Defaults to None.

day.description: Calendar day of the month. Defaults to None.

year.description: 4-digit year (e.g., 1776). For BC/BCE years, use a negative integer (e.g., -351 for 351 BC). Defaults to None.

offset.description: Number of results to offset (for pagination). Defaults to None.

name: get_hebrew_month
description: Fetches the Hebrew month for a given Gregorian date string using the Enoch Calendar API.

description: Fetches the forecast data for a given zone type and zone ID using the National Weather Service API.

zoneid.description: The ID of the zone for which to fetch the forecast.

name: measure_distance
description: Calculates the distance between two geographic locations defined by their latitude and longitude coordinates.

unit.description: Unit of distance measurement. Valid options are 'km' (default), 'mi', 'ft', and 'yd'.

name: minus_di
description: Fetches the Minus Directional Indicator (MINUS_DI) for a given financial instrument.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series data. Supported intervals are: '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', '1month'.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Defaults to 30 if no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum.

time_period.description: The number of periods to consider in the calculation. Defaults to 9.

format.description: The format of the data returned. Can be 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Defaults to 'json'.

name: real_time_user_search

keyword.description: The search keyword. For example: 'amazon'.

skip.description: The number of records to skip in the search results. Useful for paginating results.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return. Default is 30, and the maximum allowed value is 30.

name: get_field_and_field_invite_id

name: user_login

username.description: Username for the user account. For US domestic users, this should be a 10-digit number. For international users, use the full E.164 format (e.g., US: 5555555555, E.164: +1155555555555).

address.description: The address or location for which to generate the image. Default is 'Times Square'.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels. Maximum is 1024. Default is 1024.

sort.description: Sort properties by specified criteria. Possible values:

page.description: Page number for paginated results.

description: Fetches the content of a link or token by its ID using the Token2Go API.

is_id.description: The ID of the link or token to be fetched.

t.description: The type of content to fetch (either 'link' or 'token').

name: memre_api_v1_readiness
description: Get the readiness status of a user for a specified item from the memre API.

user_id.description: The ID of the user whose readiness status is being queried.

item_id.description: The ID of the item for which the readiness status is being queried.

name: get_the_awarded_books_of_a_year
description: Retrieves the list of awarded books for a specific year, including details such as the book's name, winning category, and cover image.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the list of awarded books.

name: downloader
description: This function searches for MP3 music using the given keywords and returns the results from the specified page.

keywords.description: The search keywords for finding MP3 music.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name: image_stable_prompter
description: Generates a prompt for stable diffusion using an image URL via the Toolbench RapidAPI.

url.description: The full path of the image URL to be processed. Defaults to None.

name: placessearchinboundingbox
description: Searches for places within a bounding box defined by the northeast and southwest coordinates in GeoJSON format.

northeast.description: Coordinates of the north-east corner of the bounding box, provided as a string in the format 'latitude,longitude'.

southwest.description: Coordinates of the south-west corner of the bounding box, provided as a string in the format 'latitude,longitude'.

intersect.description: Whether to include areas that intersect with the bounding box. Defaults to None.

name: review_filters_list
description: Fetch supported options metadata for filtering hotel reviews.

hotel_id.description: The unique identifier of the hotel from the properties list API.

languagecode.description: The language code for the response. Default is 'en-us'.

filter_language.description: Comma-separated values of languages for filtering reviews. Default is 'en,nl'.

filter_customer_type.description: Comma-separated values of customer types to filter by. Default is 'couple,family_with_children'.

user_sort.description: Sorting preference for results. Default is 'sort_most_relevant'.

name: retrieve_compensation
description: Fetches the full compensation details associated with a given ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID for which to retrieve the compensation details.

name: co2_emission
description: Fetches the carbon emissions in grams per Kilo-Watt-Hour for electricity in Germany based on the given date. Allows retrieving both the latest and historical data back to the year 2017.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve carbon emission data. Accepted formats include 'YYYY-MM-DD', 'MM/DD/YYYY', or Unix Timestamp (in milliseconds). Defaults to '2022-08-20'.

name: account_transaction_count
description: Retrieves the number of transactions performed by a specified address on the Binance Smart Chain.

address.description: The blockchain address to be scanned.

network.description: The network to use, either 'mainnet' or 'testnet'. Defaults to None.

name: d_die
description: Rolls a die with a given number of faces by making a request to an API.

die.description: The number of faces on the die. Must be between 2 and 100.

name: assess_diabetes_risk
description: Assesses the risk of developing type 2 diabetes based on body mass index (BMI) and physical activity level.

activity.description: Physical activity level. Allowed values: "sedentary", "lightly active", "moderately active", or "very active".

name: product_offers
description: Fetches a list of offers for a specific product on Amazon based on the given ASIN.

asin.description: Product ASIN to get offers for. Supports batching up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by a comma (e.g., 'B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V,B08BHXG144').

delivery.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Find products with specific delivery options, specified as a comma-delimited list. Valid values: 'PRIME_ELIGIBLE', 'FREE_DELIVERY'. Default is None.

limit.description: Maximum number of offers to return. Default is 100.

product_condition.description: Filter products by condition, specified as a comma-delimited list. Valid values: 'NEW', 'USED_LIKE_NEW', 'USED_VERY_GOOD', 'USED_GOOD', 'USED_ACCEPTABLE'. Default is None.

country.description: Sets the marketplace country, language, and currency. Allowed values: 'US', 'AU', 'BR', 'CA', 'CN', 'FR', 'DE', 'IN', 'IT', 'MX', 'NL', 'SG', 'ES', 'TR', 'AE', 'GB', 'JP'. Default is 'US'.

name: fixtures
description: Retrieves the fixtures for an entire season based on the competition ID and season ID.

name: nhl_standings
description: Retrieves the NHL standings for a specified year and group.

year.description: The year for which the NHL standings are to be retrieved.

group.description: The group by which to filter the standings. Acceptable values are 'league', 'conference', and 'division'. Defaults to 'league' if not specified.

name: fetch_company_details
description: Fetch company details by company name using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

query.description: The company name to search for.

name: stochrsi
description: Fetches the Stochastic Relative Strength Index (STOCHRSI) for a given financial instrument using the Twelve Data API.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be an equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values include `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

fast_dma_type.description: The type of moving average used for smoothing. Supported values are `SMA`, `EMA`, `WMA`, `DEMA`, `TEMA`, `TRIMA`, `KAMA`, `MAMA`, `T3MA`. Defaults to `SMA`.

series_type.description: The type of series data. Supported values are `open`, `high`, `low`, `close`. Defaults to `close`.

fast_d_period.description: The period for the fast D moving average. Defaults to 3.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Defaults to 30.

fast_k_period.description: The period for the fast K moving average. Defaults to 3.

format.description: The output format of the API response. Supported values are `json` and `csv`. Defaults to `json`.

time_period.description: The period for the RSI calculation. Defaults to 14.

name: california_alimony
description: Calculates the total alimony one spouse would have to pay to the other in California over a given duration.

payor_monthly_income.description: The monthly gross income of the payor spouse.

recipient_monthly_income.description: The monthly gross income of the recipient spouse.

duration_years.description: The duration of the alimony in years.

name: points_point
description: Fetches forecast information for a given geographical point from the National Weather Service.

point.description: Latitude and longitude in the format 'EPSG:4326 latitude, EPSG:4326 longitude'.

name: hourly
description: Fetch hourly weather forecast for a specified location over the next 5 days using AI technology.

lon.description: Longitude in formats like '12E', '12.3E', or '-13.4'. This parameter is optional if `place_id` is provided.

lat.description: Latitude in formats like '12N', '12.3N', or '-13.4'. This parameter is optional if `place_id` is provided.

language.description: Language for the text summaries. Options are 'en' (English), 'es' (Spanish), 'fr' (French), 'de' (German), 'pl' (Polish), 'cs' (Czech).

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. If provided, it overrides `lat` and `lon`.

units.description: Unit system to be used. Options are 'auto', 'metric', 'us', 'uk', 'ca'. Default is 'auto'.

timezone.description: Timezone for the date fields. Can be a tzinfo database string like 'Europe/Prague', 'UTC', or 'auto' to use the local timezone of the location. Default is 'auto'.

name: get_mark_price_kline
description: Fetches the mark price kline data for a specified trading symbol within a given time range and interval.

start.description: The start timestamp for the result in milliseconds.

symbol.description: The trading symbol to query.

category.description: The derivatives products category. Currently available categories include 'linear' and 'inverse' (inverse futures).

end.description: The end timestamp for the result in milliseconds.

limit.description: The limit for data size per page, with a maximum of 200. Defaults to 200 pieces of data per page.

name: options_historical
description: Returns historical options data based on the given parameters.

expiration.description: The expiration date of the option in the format YYYY-mm-dd, e.g., '2018-04-20'.

type.description: The type of option contract, either 'Call' or 'Put'.

strike.description: The strike price of the option, e.g., 100.

symbol.description: The symbol of the asset, e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple Inc, 'MSFT' for Microsoft.

name: gedetailedtinsiders
description: Fetch detailed insider trading information for a given stock ticker.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to fetch insider trading details.

name: get_all_food
description: Fetches a list of Ghanaian foods including ingredients and a short description from the specified API endpoint.

page.description: The page number to request data from. Default is '?page=2'.

name: get_new_releases
description: Fetch new album releases from Spotify for a specified country.

country.description: A standardized country code (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'CA' for Canada). Full list of supported country codes includes: AD, AE, AG, AL, AM, AO, AR, AT, AU, AZ, BA, BB, BD, BE, BF, BG, BH, BI, BJ, BN, BO, BR, BS, BT, BW, BZ, CA, CD, CG, CH, CI, CL, CM, CO, CR, CV, CW, CY, CZ, DE, DJ, DK, DM, DO, DZ, EC, EE, EG, ES, ET, FI, FJ, FM, FR, GA, GB, GD, GE, GH, GM, GN, GQ, GR, GT, GW, GY, HK, HN, HR, HT, HU, ID, IE, IL, IN, IQ, IS, IT, JM, JO, JP, KE, KG, KH, KI, KM, KN, KR, KW, KZ, LA, LB, LC, LI, LK, LR, LS, LT, LU, LV, LY, MA, MC, MD, ME, MG, MH, MK, ML, MN, MO, MR, MT, MU, MV, MW, MX, MY, MZ, NA, NE, NG, NI, NL, NO, NP, NR, NZ, OM, PA, PE, PG, PH, PK, PL, PS, PT, PW, PY, QA, RO, RS, RW, SA, SB, SC, SE, SG, SI, SK, SL, SM, SN, SR, ST, SV, SZ, TD, TG, TH, TJ, TL, TN, TO, TR, TT, TV, TW, TZ, UA, UG, US, UY, UZ, VC, VE, VN, VU, WS, XK, ZA, ZM, ZW.

limit.description: Maximum number of album releases to return (default is 20; maximum allowed is 50).

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (default is 0).

name: get_the_forecast
description: Fetches the weather forecast for the specified city using the RapidAPI Cloud Cast service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the weather forecast.

name: ocean_conditions_closest_to_latitude_longitude
description: Search for current and predicted ocean conditions closest to a specified latitude and longitude.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

name: get_models
description: Fetches all models from a given manufacturer using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer for which to retrieve models.

name: purgequeue
description: Clears the send message queue for a given phone ID using the Maytapi WhatsApp API.

phone_id.description: The ID of the phone whose message queue is to be purged.

name: get_artist_s_albums
description: Fetches and returns basic details about the albums of an artist from a given Spotify URL.

spotify_url.description: The URL of the artist's Spotify page.

name: concerts
description: Fetches concert information using the Spotify API through RapidAPI, filtered by the specified geographical location.

gl.description: The geographical location filter to apply when fetching concert information.

name: news_from_individual_source
description: Fetches the latest news articles from a specified F1 news source using the RapidAPI.

sourceid.description: Identifier of the F1 news source (e.g., skyf1, BBCF1, WTF1, autosport).

name: search_related_sites
description: Finds sites related to a specified URL using the Advanced SERP Operators API.

website.description: The URL of the website for which to find related sites.

location.description: The proxy location for the search. Supported countries are 'US', 'CA', 'IE', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE', 'SE', 'IN', 'JP', 'KR', 'SG', 'AU', 'BR'. Defaults to 'us'.

max_results.description: The maximum number of related sites to return. Defaults to 10.

name: get_the_timezones
description: Fetches the list of timezones from the specified RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name.description: The name filter to apply to the timezones. Defaults to None.

name: get_individual_news_from_source_news
description: Fetches news about climate change from a specified news source.

newspaperid.description: The ID of the newspaper from which to fetch news.

name: jokes_search
description: Conducts a free text search for jokes based on the provided query.

query.description: The search term used to filter jokes.

name: echo
description: Sends a GET request to the Echo API with specific headers and query parameters.

header1.description: The first header to include in the request. Defaults to '1'.

query2.description: The second query parameter to include in the request. Defaults to '2'.

name: headtoheadmatches
description: Fetches head-to-head match data for a specific E-Sports event using the provided custom ID.

customid.description: The custom ID of the E-Sports event for which head-to-head match data is required.

name: block
description: Fetches detailed data from a specified block on the Optimism blockchain using the RapidAPI service.

block.description: The block identifier to retrieve data for.

network.description: The network to query ('mainnet' or 'testnet'). Defaults to None.

name: matchdetails
description: Fetch detailed information for a specific American Football match from the API.

is_id.description: The ID of the match for which the details are to be retrieved.

name: detail_info
description: Fetches detailed information of an application using its slug from the SuggestUse API.

slug.description: The application's unique identifier used to fetch its details.

name: top_grossing_games
description: Fetches the top-grossing games chart from the Google Play Store, with support for filtering by category, language, and region.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Allowed values are between 1 and 200. Default is 50. Note that requests with a limit value between 101-200 will be charged double (2 requests).

language.description: The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code according to ISO 639-1. Default is 'en'.

category.description: The specific Google Play category to filter the chart by (e.g., 'GAME_RACING'). Default is None.

region.description: The 2-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 to specify the region. Default is 'us'.

name: getuserbyid
description: Fetches and returns user information by user ID from a specified API.

is_id.description: The ID of the user to fetch information for.

name: competitions_scorers
description: Fetches the list of current top scorers for a specified league and year.

is_id.description: The identifier for the league.

year.description: The year for which the top scorers are being requested. Defaults to '2021'.

name: get_airline_details
description: Fetch details for an airline based on its IATA code.

code.description: The IATA code of the airline for which details are to be fetched.

name: us_de
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Delaware.

date.description: A specific date for querying historical gas price data. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned.

name: nearby_stores
description: Fetches a list of stores near a specified ZIP code from the RapidAPI Target API.

place.description: The ZIP code or address around which to search for stores.

within.description: The radius of the search area in miles. Defaults to '100'.

limit.description: The maximum number of store results to return. Defaults to '20'.

name: stock_v2_get_mini_chart_realtime_data
description: Fetch realtime mini chart data for a given stock performance ID from the Morningstar API.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock for which realtime mini chart data is requested. This value can be obtained from the /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.

name: get_sign_prediction_for_today_by_name
description: Fetches the zodiac sign prediction for today based on the provided sign name using the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the zodiac sign for which the prediction is requested.

name: search_gifs
description: Search for gifs based on a query using the Humor API.

query.description: The search query to find matching gifs.

number.description: The number of results to retrieve, between 1 and 10. Defaults to 3.

name: forex_quotes
description: Fetches the real-time price of a forex currency pair.

name: stations_stationid
description: Fetch metadata about a specified weather station using the station ID.

stationid.description: The ID of the weather station.

name: artist_overview
description: Fetches an overview of an artist from the Spotify API using RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The Spotify ID of the artist.

name: random_post
description: Generates a list of fake posts by calling an external API.

size.description: The number of fake posts to generate. Defaults to 5.

name: list_all_platforms
description: Fetches a list of platforms from the "Is This Coin A Scam" API based on various search criteria.

symbol.description: Search all platform symbols. Wildcard searches can be performed using the * character (e.g., symbol=*TH). Multiple items can be searched at once by sending a comma-separated list (e.g., symbol=TOK,*TH). Default is 'ETH'.

limit.description: Limit the number of records returned. Default is 10.

name.description: Search all platform names. Wildcard searches can be performed using the * character (e.g., name=*platform). Multiple items can be searched at once by sending a comma-separated list (e.g., name=ethereum,*token). Default is 'ethereum'.

page.description: The page number to start from. Default is 10.

slug.description: Search all platform slugs. Wildcard searches can be performed using the * character (e.g., slug=*token). Multiple items can be searched at once by sending a comma-separated list (e.g., slug=ethereum,*token). Default is 'ethereum'.

name: gettotalsolved
description: Fetches the total number of questions solved by the given LeetCode user.

username.description: The LeetCode username of the user whose solved questions are to be retrieved.

name: is_perfect_square
description: Checks if a number is a perfect square.

name: get_station_information
description: Get information about a NOAA tide station using its ID.

is_id.description: The station ID to retrieve information for.

name: emailverifier
description: Verify the deliverability of an email address using the Tomba API.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

name: search_books
description: Search for books on Project Gutenberg using a given search term and return the search results as JSON or text.

term.description: The search term to use for finding books.

name: business_photos
description: Fetches photos of a business using its unique Business Id through the RapidAPI service.

business_id.description: The unique identifier of the business. This can be a google_id, business_id, or google_place_id. Examples of valid IDs include `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed` and `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

limit.description: The maximum number of business photos to return. Acceptable values range from 1 to 10000. Defaults to 5.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of photo fields to include in the response. By default, all fields are returned. Example: `type,photo_url`.

region.description: The region or country from which to query Google Maps. For a list of supported region/country codes, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code). Defaults to 'us'.

name: vin_decode
description: Decodes a given Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) using the RapidAPI VIN Decoder service.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number to decode.

name: wnba_standings
description: Fetches the WNBA team standings for a given year, with optional grouping.

year.description: The year for which the standings are to be fetched.

group.description: The group name for standings, either 'league' or 'conference'. Defaults to 'league'.

name: getresult
description: Retrieves the result of a previously requested video rendering job using the given job ID.

job_id.description: The ID of the previously requested rendering job.

name: get_pokemon_move_info
description: Retrieves information about a Pokémon's move using the PokéAPI.

move_name.description: The name of the move to check. Defaults to "run".

name: v1_inflation
description: Fetches current monthly and annual inflation percentages from the API Ninjas Inflation API endpoint.

type.description: Inflation indicator type. Can be either "CPI" (Consumer Price Index) or "HICP" (Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices). Defaults to "CPI" if not provided.

name: get_tiktok_video_info
description: Fetches detailed information about a TikTok video, including options for HD quality and no watermark.

url.description: The URL of the TikTok video. It can be in the format of a TikTok ID or a direct TikTok video link.

name: get_types
description: Fetches available types for a specified period from the horoscopes API.

period.description: The time period for which to retrieve the available types (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly).

name: getrandom
description: Retrieve a random sequence of characters based on the specified attributes.

length.description: The length of the random sequence to generate.

case.description: Specifies the case for the character sequence. Defaults to 'all'.

extra.description: Specifies whether to include special characters in the sequence. Defaults to 'true'.

type.description: Specifies the type of sequence (e.g., 'all', 'string', 'number', 'special'). Defaults to 'all'.

name: city_data
description: Fetches a list of cities using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

count.description: The number of cities to retrieve. Defaults to 10. Maximum value is 1000.

name: stays_properties_detail_photos
description: Fetch detailed photos of a specific property from the stays/properties/detail/photos endpoint using the Booking.com RapidAPI.

language_code.description: The language code to use for the response. Default is 'en-us'.

id_detail.description: The ID of the property to fetch detail photos for. Default is 'cr/la-buena-vida-cabinas'.

name: trip_details
description: Fetches the details of a trip using the given trip UID from the Flixbus API.

name: get_specific_pizza
description: Fetches a specific pizza by its ID from the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The ID of the pizza to retrieve.

name: footballersbyclub
description: Fetches a list of footballers for a specified club using the Premier League Stats API.

club.description: The name of the football club to retrieve the list of footballers for.

name: standings
description: Fetches and returns the standings for a specified season and competition.

season_id.description: The ID of the season for which the standings are to be fetched.

comp_id.description: The ID of the competition for which the standings are to be fetched.

name: search_api
description: Searches for location information using the World Weather Online API.

q.description: The query value for the location search.

format.description: The format of the response. Defaults to None.

name: links_finder
description: Fetches relevant links based on a given query using the ExplorArc's Link Finder API.

query.description: The search query to find relevant links. Defaults to 'roadmap'.

name: find_longest_word
description: Finds the longest word in a list of words.

name: fighter
description: Fetches the details of a single fighter given their ID using the Spectation Sports Events API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the fighter to fetch.

name: find_places
description: Searches for places by name to obtain a place_id for use with Weather Forecast Endpoints and retrieves detailed geographical information (e.g., country, region, elevation, timezone) for a given location.

text.description: Name of the place to search.

language.description: Language in which the place names will be returned. Available options include:

name: get_stations
description: Retrieve the nearest electric vehicle charging stations within a specified distance.

distance.description: The radius in miles to search for charging stations. Defaults to '100'.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the search location. Defaults to '2.4379392'.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the search location. Defaults to '44.351488'.

name: memre_api_v1_study
description: Retrieves learning items that a specific user should study using the Memre API.

user_id.description: The ID of the user for whom to retrieve learning items.

name: get_campaign_lead_from_id
description: Retrieve lead information from a campaign using its ID via the Fomo API.

is_id.description: The ID of the campaign to retrieve the lead information from.

name: get_company_ads_count
description: Fetch the number of ads a specific company has posted on LinkedIn using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

company_id.description: The unique identifier of the company whose ad count is to be fetched.

name: search_tweet
description: Searches for tweets based on a given query string using the Twitter Pack API.

q.description: The query string to search for in tweets.

cursor.description: The cursor string to paginate through results. Defaults to 'scroll:thGAVUV0VFVBaegLaxgNKXty0WloC2kd7Tl7ctEnEVzId6FYCJehgEVVNFUjUBFQAVAAA='.

count.description: The number of tweets to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

name: custom_dice_rolls
description: Roll any number of dice with a specified number of sides a specified number of times using the Dice Roll Simulator API.

dice.description: The number of dice to roll. Defaults to 3.

sides.description: The number of sides on each die. Defaults to 8.

rolls.description: The number of times to roll the dice. Defaults to '2'.

name: convert_cooking_measurements
description: Converts a quantity of a cooking ingredient from one measurement unit to another.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item to convert.

from_unit.description: The unit of the input quantity (e.g., 'cup', 'gram').

to_unit.description: The unit to which the quantity should be converted (e.g., 'ounce', 'kilogram').

name: search_agent
description: Search for an agent's information using the Zillow API.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Defaults to None.

locationtext.description: The location to search for agents, which can be a city name (e.g., 'Newport Beach') or a zip code (e.g., '90278'). Defaults to 'Newport Beach'.

name.description: The name of the agent to search for. Defaults to None.

name: screenshot_endpoint
description: Takes a screenshot of a specified webpage URL with given dimensions.

height.description: The height of the screenshot in pixels.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to capture.

width.description: The width of the screenshot in pixels.

fullscreen.description: Whether to capture the screenshot in fullscreen mode. Defaults to 'true'.

name: linecount_linecount
description: Fetches all poems from the Poetry DB with a specific number of lines.

linecount.description: The number of lines in each poem to be fetched.

name: ecoweather
description: Retrieve historical weather data for a specified location within a given date range.

lon.description: Longitude of the geo-location in degrees.

lat.description: Latitude of the geo-location in degrees.

to.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to '2022-09-31'.

name: get_posts_from_category
description: Fetch posts from a specified category using the 9gag API. Optionally, provide a counter and after parameter for pagination in subsequent requests.

category.description: The category of posts to fetch.

counter.description: Leave blank for the first request. For subsequent requests, provide the counter received from the previous request. Defaults to None.

after.description: Leave blank for the first request. For subsequent requests, provide the after parameter received from the previous request. Defaults to None.

name: qrcode
description: Generates a QR code from the provided text using the QR Code API.

text.description: The input text to be converted into a QR code.

name: custom_captcha
description: Creates a custom captcha code using the RapidAPI service.
