name: get_product_detail
description: Fetches product details from the Tokopedia API using the provided action and slug.

act.description: The action to be performed by the API.

slug.description: The unique identifier for the product.

pretty.description: If set to True, formats the API response to be more readable. Defaults to None.

name: ln
description: Returns the natural logarithm (LN) transforms of all data points for a given financial instrument using the Twelve Data API.

symbol.description: The financial instrument symbol, which can be an equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`, etc.).

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported intervals: `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to retrieve. The default value is `30` when no date parameters are set; otherwise, it is set to the maximum available.

format.description: The output format of the data. Supported values are `CSV` and `JSON`. The default value is `JSON`.

series_type.description: The type of data series to retrieve. Supported values are `open`, `high`, `low`, and `close`. The default value is `close`.

name: shows_id
description: Fetch metadata associated with the specified show from the given platform.

platform.description: Source platform for the show. Possible values are 'ios', 'android', 'androidtv', 'web'.

is_id.description: The ID of the show. Can also be a TMDB ID.

region.description: Region to retrieve the sources' deep link from. Default is 'US'. Possible values are 'US', 'FR'.

name: search_zip_codes
description: Searches for valid Mexican zip codes that start with the given digits using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

codigo_postal.description: Starting digits of the postal code to search for.

name: heroes_data
description: Fetches detailed data on Dota 2 heroes, including names, images, videos, roles, abilities, and talents, in the specified language.

language.description: The language code in which to retrieve hero data (supports up to 20 languages).

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the specific hero.

name: get_u_58_athlete_ranking
description: Fetches the Under-58kg athlete ranking for Taekwondo from the RapidAPI Taekwondo API.

country.description: The name of the country to filter the athlete rankings by. If not provided, rankings from all countries are returned.

name: difficulty
description: Fetches weed strain information based on the difficulty of growing (easy, medium, or difficult).

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of growing the strain. Acceptable values are 'easy', 'medium', or 'difficult'.

name: streams_symbol
description: Fetches the most recent messages for a specified stock symbol from the StockTwits API.

is_id.description: Ticker symbol, Stock ID, or RIC code of the symbol.

since.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

max.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

limit.description: The number of messages to retrieve, with a default of 20. The maximum allowed value is 30.

callback.description: Custom callback function name for the request.

filter.description: Filter messages by links, charts, videos, or top.

name: get_the_yield
description: Fetches the yield information for a given stock ticker using the SundayFinance API.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve the yield information.

name: fetch_chapters
description: Fetches the list of chapters for a given manga ID from the Mangaverse API.

is_id.description: The ID of the manga for which chapters need to be fetched. Defaults to '6486b7547ae7cb74845df856'.

name: get_wind_speed
description: Fetches the current wind speed for a specified city using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve wind speed information.

name: country_details
description: Fetches the details for a specific country from the GeoDB API, including information on the number of regions.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id representing the country.

asciimode.description: If set to True, display results using ASCII characters.

languagecode.description: The language code to display the results in the specified language.

name: api_assetinfo
description: Fetches information about a single asset using the given symbol.

symbol.description: The symbol representing the asset to fetch information for.

name: retrieve_buy_sell_informations_by_id
description: Retrieve the latest Buy/Sell orders placed on the Steam Store for a given item ID.

is_id.description: The item ID for which to retrieve the buy/sell orders.

name: getlearningresources
description: Fetches Azure learning resources from a specified page using RapidAPI.

page.description: The page number for the learning resources to be fetched.

name: balance
description: Retrieves the balance sheet statements of a specified stock company.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company (e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple Inc.).

period.description: The reporting period for the balance sheet, which can be 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

name: channel_playlists
description: Fetches playlists from a specified YouTube channel using the YouTube Data API and various filters.

hl.description: Language parameter, specified as a BCP-47 language code. Defaults to 'en'.

filter.description: Filter key or token to specify the type of playlists to return. Defaults to None. Available options:

cursor.description: Continuation token for pagination. Defaults to None.

is_id.description: The YouTube channel ID to fetch playlists for. Defaults to 'UC-lHJZR3Gqxm24_Vd_AJ5Yw'.

gl.description: Geolocation parameter to filter results by region. Defaults to 'US'.

name: house_prices_get_sales_history
description: Retrieve the sales history for a given property using the Zoopla API.

property_id.description: The identifier for the property for which to retrieve the sales history.

name: display_entities
description: Displays the extracted named entities from the given text using a specified model and RapidAPI service.

text.description: The text to extract entities from.
text.default: An October post from Dylan that may be saving you a Google search.

model.description: The name of the model to use for entity extraction. If None, the default model will be used.

spans.description: Specific spans to use for entity extraction. If None, entity extraction will be performed on the entire text.

name: v1_trivia
description: Fetches trivia questions from the API Ninjas Trivia API endpoint.

limit.description: The number of trivia questions to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

category.description: The category of trivia questions to filter by. Possible values are:

name: cars_get_images
description: Fetches images of a car model for a specified model year.

modelyearid.description: The ID of the car model year for which images are to be fetched.

name: downloadscreenshot
description: Downloads a custom screenshot generated using the `takeScreenshot` API endpoint.

is_id.description: Unique screenshot identifier provided by the response to a `takeScreenshot` request.

name: followers_by_username
description: Fetches the followers list for a given Instagram username using the RapidAPI service.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch the followers.

nextmaxid.description: The ID to fetch the next page of results (used for pagination). Defaults to None.

corsenabled.description: A flag to enable CORS. Defaults to None.

name: domainsearch
description: Searches for email addresses associated with a given domain, optionally filtered by department and paginated by page number.

domain.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, 'stripe.com'.

department.description: Get only email addresses for people working in the selected department. Default is 'pr'.

page.description: Specifies the number of email addresses to skip by page number. Default is 1.

name: institutional_holders
description: Fetches the percentage of a company's stock owned by institutional holders such as pension funds, insurance companies, and investment firms.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company.

country.description: The country in which the company is located. Defaults to None.

exchange.description: The stock exchange where the company's shares are traded. Defaults to None.

name: get_post_likes
description: Fetches the likes for a specific post on Twitter using the given post ID.

count.description: The number of likes to fetch.

pid.description: The post ID for which to fetch likes.

cursor.description: A cursor for paginating through the results. Defaults to None.

name: busca_por_simbolo
description: Fetches data for a given stock symbol using the Alpha Vantage API.

function.description: The type of function to be called in the API (e.g., 'TIME_SERIES_DAILY').

apikey.description: The API key for accessing Alpha Vantage API.

outputsize.description: The size of the data output (e.g., 'compact' or 'full').

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which data is to be fetched.

name: inn_general_director
description: Retrieves the general director information of a company based on its INN (tax identification number) using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

inn.description: The INN number of the company.

name: domain_check
description: Checks the availability status of one or multiple domains using the RapidAPI service.

domains.description: Comma-separated list of domains to check.

domain.description: A specific domain name to check in addition to the list. Defaults to None.

name: get_all_brands
description: Fetches all available brands from the iHerb Product Data API for a given page number.

page.description: The page number to retrieve brands from.

name: ip_lookup
description: This function performs an IP lookup using the provided IP address and returns the geolocation details. It utilizes the IP Whois Geolocation API from RapidAPI.

ip.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) to look up.

name: ec
description: Analyzes a given password based on a variety of parameters and returns the analysis.

password.description: The password to be analyzed. It must be between 4 and 128 characters long.

penalty.description: The penalty applied to each character that is part of a word, number sequence, alphabet sequence, etc. The penalty is a float number in the range [0, 1], with a default value of 0.25.

outputformat.description: The format of the returned analysis. Allowed values are 'json', 'xml', and 'yaml'. The default value is 'xml'.

reqid.description: An identifier for this request. This string must match the regular expression `^(?i)[a-z0-9]{8,16}$`. If not provided, a randomly generated identifier will be assigned.

name: v1_whois
description: Fetches the WHOIS information for a given domain using the API Ninjas Whois API.

domain.description: The domain to retrieve WHOIS information for.

name: superoffer
description: Fetches the super offer data from the bet sports API.

cookie.description: Cookie string for the request header. Default is 'i18next=es;'.

host.description: Host string for the request header. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

referer.description: Referer string for the request header. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

name: gethomepage
description: Fetch limited radio station data to display on the homepage.

limit.description: The number of radio stations to retrieve. Default is 10.

name: getallquotes
description: Fetch all quotes from the Radio World API with optional pagination and API key.

limit.description: The number of quotes to fetch per page. Defaults to 10.

page.description: The page number to fetch. Defaults to 1.

name: nearest_stations
description: Return the nearest alternative fuel stations within a specified location or coordinates.

location.description: A free-form input describing the address of the location. Default is '433 Bryant St., San Francisco'.

latitude.description: The latitude of the desired location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the desired location.

radius.description: The radius (in miles) around the search location to search for stations within.

status.description: Return stations that match the given status. Options are 'all', 'E', 'P'.

access.description: The accessibility type of the stations. Options are 'all', 'public', 'private'.

fuel_type.description: The type of fuel provided by the stations. Options are 'all', 'BD', 'CNG', 'E85', 'ELEC', 'HY', 'LNG', 'LPG'. Default is 'ELEC'.

cards_accepted.description: Payment methods accepted by the stations.

owner_type.description: Type of ownership of the stations. Options include 'all', 'FG', 'LG', 'P', 'SG', 'T'.

federal_agency_id.description: Filter stations by the federal agency owner IDs.

ev_network.description: Electric charging stations belonging to specified networks.

ev_charging_level.description: Levels of electric vehicle supply equipment. Options include 'all', '1', '2', 'dc_fast'.

state.description: Return only stations within the given state. Must be provided as a two-character state code.

zip.description: Return only stations within the given ZIP code.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is '1'.

offset.description: Offset the results found to paginate the results.

name: home_team_last_10_matches
description: Fetches the statistics and list of the last 10 matches played by the home team for a given team ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the home team for which to fetch the last 10 matches.

name: cities_states_stateisocode
description: Fetches the list of cities for a given state's ISO code using the specified RapidAPI key.

stateisocode.description: The ISO code of the state for which the cities need to be retrieved.

name: match_boxscore
description: Fetch detailed and live statistics for a given football match.

matchid.description: The unique identifier for the football match.

name: metric_kilograms
description: Calculates the BMI (Body Mass Index) of an individual using metric measurements.

weight.description: The weight of an individual in kilograms (kg).

height.description: The height of an individual in meters (m).

name: get_car_versions
description: Get the different versions of a car model using the toolbench RapidAPI.

model.description: The specific model of the car.

name: getqrcode
description: Generates a QR code URL based on the specified type and value.

type.description: The format of the QR code to generate. Valid options are 'url', 'text', 'telno', 'mailto', or 'smsto'.

value.description: The content to encode within the QR code. Example values are 'https://www.google.com' for 'url', 'Some text' for 'text', '9142545474' for 'telno', and '8542487542' for 'smsto'.

name: getallcountry
description: Fetches the list of country names via an API based on the provided query parameters.

limit.description: The maximum number of items per page. Default is 500.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Default is 1.

order.description: The order in which to sort results. Accepts 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Default is 'ASC'.

name: get_all_details
description: Fetches all details of a YouTube video, stream, or shorts including captions, audio-only files, video-only files, and stream URL if available.

is_id.description: The unique ID of the YouTube video/stream/shorts.

name: permutation_count
description: Calculates the number of permutations of k elements from a set of n elements.

n.description: The total number of elements in the set.

k.description: The number of elements to choose for the permutation.

name: commune_par_nom
description: Fetch one or more communes by their name, with exact or partial matching.

nom.description: The name of the commune to search for. Defaults to 'poum'.

name: auto_complete_deprecated
description: Fetches suggestions for a given term or phrase from the Trading View API.

text.description: Any term or phrase for which to get suggestions.

type.description: The category of suggestions to retrieve, one of the following:

lang.description: The language code for the suggestions. Defaults to 'en'.

exchange.description: The exchange code as provided by the Trading View API's exchanges list endpoint.

name: us_ia
description: Retrieves current or historical gas price data for Iowa.

date.description: Specific date for querying historical data starting from 2023-06-01. Defaults to None.

name: coins_get_news
description: Fetches news related to a specific cryptocurrency pair.

pair_id.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency pair.

lang_id.description: The language ID for the news articles. Defaults to 1.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.

time_utc_offset.description: The UTC offset in seconds. Example: UTC+8 would be 28800 seconds. Defaults to 28800.

name: user_tweets
description: Fetches a user's tweets using the Twttr RapidAPI.

twttr_proxy.description: Optional proxy to use for the Twitter API request.

twttr_session.description: Optional session identifier for the Twitter API request.

user_id.description: The Twitter user ID for which to fetch tweets.

username.description: The Twitter username for which to fetch tweets (default is 'elonmusk').

name: v4_sports_sport_odds
description: Fetches a list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, displaying bookmaker odds for the specified regions and markets.

sport.description: The sport key for which to return games and odds. If `sport` is set to 'upcoming', it will return the next 8 upcoming games across all sports and any live games.

regions.description: Comma-delimited list of regions to determine which bookmakers appear in the response. Each region will count as 1 request against the usage quota for each market.

oddsformat.description: Format of the returned odds. Defaults to 'decimal'.

markets.description: Comma-delimited list of odds markets to return. Defaults to 'h2h,spreads'. Note that each market counts as 1 request against the usage quota.

dateformat.description: Format of the returned timestamps. Can be 'iso' (ISO8601) or 'unix' timestamp (seconds since epoch). Defaults to 'iso'.

name: series_get_stats
description: Fetches statistical data for a given cricket series from the Cricbuzz API.

seriesid.description: The ID of the series for which statistics are to be retrieved. This ID is typically obtained from the series list or series list-archives endpoints.

statstype.description: The type of statistics to retrieve. This value is obtained from the series/get-stats-filter endpoint.

name: product_id
description: Fetches product details from the AliExpress API using the provided product ID and optional parameters.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to fetch details for.

locale.description: The locale to be used for the request (e.g., 'en_US').

country.description: The country for regional adjustments (e.g., 'US').

name: titles_id_crew

name: get_player_details

name.description: The username of the player. This is case sensitive.

region.description: The region of the player.

name: languages
description: Fetch a list of the world's languages, optionally filtered and translated.

lang_3.description: Filter by 3-letter ISO language code. Defaults to None.

iso_a2.description: Filter by 2-letter country code. Defaults to None.

fields.description: Select fields to include in the result (e.g., 'iso_a2,lang_3,flag'). Defaults to 'iso_a2,lang_3,flag'.

lang.description: Language code to translate the results into. Defaults to 'en'.

name: revenue_estimate
description: Fetches the revenue estimate for a given stock ticker using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to fetch the revenue estimate.

name: api_analyze
description: Analyzes user data on TikTok, including engagement, hashtags, mentions, and recent videos.

sec_user_id.description: The unique security user ID of the TikTok user to analyze.

name: fan_rating
description: Retrieve the fan rating for a given event using the event ID and an optional RapidAPI key.

event_id.description: The unique identifier for the event whose fan rating is to be retrieved.

name: getlivenow
description: Fetches live sports betting data from the specified API.

skinname.description: The name of the skin to filter the live data (default is 'betbiga').

name: shazam_songs_get_details

name: v1_search_enterprise
description: Perform a highly customizable search through the enterprise database with various filters and sorting options.

q.description: The search query string. Should be URL-encoded.

link_begins_with.description: Filter to include articles whose URLs start with this prefix.

sort_by.description: Sort the results by relevancy, date, or rank. Defaults to 'relevancy'.

topic.description: The topic to narrow down the articles. Accepts values like 'news', 'sport', 'tech', etc.

to.description: Upper boundary for the time range to search within.

to_rank.description: Upper boundary of the rank for news websites.

from_rank.description: Lower boundary of the rank for news websites.

lang.description: Language of the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

page_size.description: Number of articles per page. Default is 50; maximum is 100.

ranked_only.description: Limit search to top 1 million ranked sites. Defaults to 'True'.

sources.description: Comma-separated list of news sources to include.

search_in.description: Limit search to either 'title' or 'summary' of articles.

media.description: Include media information in the output. Defaults to 'True'.

is_from.description: Lower boundary for the time range to search within.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to narrow the search.

not_sources.description: Comma-separated list of news sources to exclude.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

name: user_timeline
description: Fetches the tweet timeline for a specified user ID.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the Twitter user whose timeline is to be fetched.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to 'HBaEgNKVxpvYtS0AAA=='.

count.description: Number of tweets to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

name: countries_detail
description: Fetch detailed information of a country from the unofficial Shein API.

region.description: The region code to fetch details for a specific country. Default is 'US'.

name: veiculo_tipo_id_marca_id_modelo
description: Sends a GET request to the veiculos API to retrieve vehicle information based on the type, brand, and model provided.

id_marca.description: The ID of the vehicle's brand.

id_modelo.description: The ID of the vehicle's model.

veiculo_tipo.description: The type of the vehicle (e.g., car, bike).

description: Fetches the list of opening movies for a given country using the Flixster API.

name: directory
description: Retrieves all the Local Area Codes from a given country.

name: show_character
description: Fetch details about a character and their traits from the Marvel vs. Capcom 2 API.

name.description: The name of the character to retrieve information about.

name: scrape_links
description: Scrapes a specified number of links from the provided URL using the Scrapey Link Scraper API.

url.description: The target URL from which to scrape links.

maxlinks.description: The maximum number of links to scrape. Defaults to 10.

includequery.description: Whether to include query parameters in the links. Defaults to None.

name: qualifying_results
description: Retrieve the qualifying results for a specific Formula 1 race based on the given year and location.

year.description: The year of the race.

location.description: The location of the race.

name: earnings_estimate
description: Fetches the earnings estimate for a given stock ticker using the specified RapidAPI key.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which the earnings estimate is to be fetched.

name: youtube_keyword_search
description: Performs a YouTube keyword search using the provided search query and optional parameters such as country code and language code. It sends a GET request to the YouTube keyword search API and returns the response in JSON format if possible, otherwise returns the raw response text.

q.description: The search query.

gl.description: The country code in Alpha-2 format. Default is 'us'.

hl.description: The search language code in ISO 639-1 format. Default is 'en'.

name: section_list
description: Returns a list of sections from the RapidAPI sports score service.

page.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: salvagecheck
description: Checks if a given Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) has been listed in a salvage database.

name: getallgames
description: Retrieve all games data using the RapidAPI service.

cookie.description: The cookie value to include in the query parameters. Default is 'i18next=es;'.

host.description: The host value to include in the query parameters. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

referer.description: The referer value to include in the query parameters. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

name: get_chapter_by_bookname
description: Retrieves a specific chapter from a book in the Bible using the specified book name and chapter ID.

name: additional_title_details
description: Fetch additional details for a movie or TV show based on its IMDb ID.

name: get_definitions
description: Fetch the definitions of a specified word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which to fetch the definitions.

name: v1_airlines
description: Fetches airline information using the API Ninjas Airlines API given certain parameters.

iata.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 2-character airline code. Defaults to None.

name.description: Airline name. Supports partial matching (e.g., 'United' will match 'United Airlines'). Defaults to 'Singapore Airlines'.

icao.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 3-character airline code. Defaults to None.

name: places_v2_list_by_map
description: Fetches a list of places within a specified boundary box using the AirVisual API.

nelat.description: North East latitude of the boundary.

nelon.description: North East longitude of the boundary.

swlat.description: South West latitude of the boundary.

swlon.description: South West longitude of the boundary.

x_user_lang.description: Language for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

x_units_pressure.description: Units for pressure measurement. Allowed values are 'mbar' or 'hg'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_units_temperature.description: Units for temperature measurement. Allowed values are 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_aqi_index.description: Air Quality Index standard. Allowed values are 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_distance.description: Units for distance measurement. Allowed values are 'kilometer' or 'miles'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.

name: performance_stats_for_past_predictions

federation.description: Filter statistics by a specific federation. Defaults to None.

market.description: Filter statistics based on the prediction market. Defaults to 'classic'.

name: find_favicon
description: Find the favicon for a given URL using the RapidAPI favicon finder service.

url.description: The URL for which to find the favicon.

name: dinotest
description: Tests the specified endpoint using the provided RapidAPI key and returns the response.

num.description: The endpoint number to be tested.

name: generate
description: Generate payment card numbers based on the specified quantity and scheme.

quantity.description: The number of payment card numbers to generate. Defaults to 5.

scheme.description: The scheme of the payment card numbers (e.g., 'visa', 'mastercard'). If not specified, defaults to None.

name: age_calculator
description: Calculates age based on the provided date and optional timezone.

date.description: The date of birth in one of the following formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, MMDDYYYY, MM-DD-YYYY.

timezone.description: The timezone to be considered for age calculation. Default is 'US/Eastern'. Format example: 'US/Eastern', 'US/Pacific', 'Europe/London'.

name: get_result_by_date
description: Fetches the draws result for a specific date from the Euro Millions API.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the draws result in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

name: search_quotes

max_length.description: Maximum length of the quotes to return. Defaults to 4000.

limit.description: The number of quote results to return. Defaults to 3.

min_length.description: Minimum length of the quotes to return. Defaults to 0.

name: get_all_restaurant_locations
description: Fetches a list of restaurant locations from the RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number to retrieve data from.

name: spac_price_targets
description: Fetches the latest SPAC (Special Purpose Acquisition Company) price targets from analysts, filtered by a specific SPAC symbol.

name: kanji_stroke_number

name: v1_vinlookup
description: Retrieves key vehicle information including manufacturer, country of origin, and model year for a given VIN using the API Ninjas VIN Lookup API.

vin.description: A valid Vehicle Identification Number (VIN), which must be a 17-character string.

name: flights_list_by_airline
description: Retrieve a list of flights operated by a specified airline using the RapidAPI Flight Radar service.

airline.description: The ICAO code of the airline whose flights are to be listed. This value can be obtained from the 'icao' field returned by the /airlines/list or /flights/detail endpoints, or the 'operator' field from the /flights/search endpoint.

name: results
description: Fetch soccer match results for a specified date from the Msport API.

date.description: The date of the soccer matches to retrieve results for (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD').

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: read_user
description: Fetch user details from the IronWifi API using the provided user ID.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to be fetched.

name: series_list_archives
description: Fetch archived series from the CricBuzz API based on the specified type and optional parameters for pagination and year.

type.description: The type of series to fetch. Must be one of the following: 'international', 'league', 'domestic', 'women'.

lastid.description: For pagination purposes. Specify `None` to load the first page or provide the ID of the last item from the previous page.

year.description: The year for which the series archives are to be fetched. Defaults to `None`.

name: events
description: Fetches upcoming or previous sports events from the Spectation Sports Events API.

enclosuretype.description: The type of enclosure for the events. Available options include 'ring' and 'cage'. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of enclosure for the events. Available options include 'ring' and 'cage'. Defaults to None.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: carbonfootprintfromcartravel
description: Calculates the CO2 emissions in kilograms from a car journey using a specified vehicle type and distance.

distance.description: The distance traveled by the car in kilometers.

vehicle.description: The type of car used for the journey. Options include:

name: syntax_status_syntax_ticket_get
description: Fetch the result of a syntax check using a provided ticket from the IFC BIM Services API via RapidAPI.

ticket.description: The unique identifier for the syntax check result to be retrieved.

name: get_random_named_color
description: Fetches a specified number of random named colors from the Colorful API.

quantity.description: The number of colors to return. Defaults to 2. Maximum is 50. Values below 1 will return an empty list. If not specified, returns 2 colors.

name: movies
description: Fetches the basic metadata for all movies available for playback in a specific region. The results can be sorted by popularity or in alphabetical order.

limit.description: Number of records to return per request. Optional, default is 5, and the maximum is 100.

sources.description: Filter records by source. Multiple sources can be comma-separated. Optional, default is 'netflix,hulu'. Possible values include free, tv_everywhere, subscription, purchase, and specific sources such as netflix or hulu.

region.description: Filter results by region. Optional, default is 'US'. Possible values include 'US', 'FR'.

offset.description: Number of records to skip. Optional, default is 0.

sort.description: Method to sort the records. Optional, default is 'popularity'. Possible values are 'alphabetical' and 'popularity'.

name: custom_die
description: Simulates rolling a custom die with a specified number of sides using the RapidAPI service.

sides.description: The number of sides on the custom die. Default is 8.

name: get_records
description: Fetch Guinness World Records for a given search term using the RapidAPI service.

term.description: The search term to find Guinness World Records.

pagenum.description: Page number of the results to fetch. Defaults to 1.

maxresults.description: Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 20.

name: get_anime_by_id
description: Retrieve anime details by given ID from the RapidAPI Anime Jokes API.

is_id.description: The ID of the anime to search for.

name: get_specific_player
description: Retrieves information for a specific player from the NBA API using their player ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the player to retrieve.

name: consulta_por_cnpj
description: Fetches data and information for a given CNPJ.

cnpj.description: The CNPJ number to be queried.

name: gs1code128
description: Generates a GS1-128 barcode based on provided data and company prefix, with optional lot and quantity information.

data.description: The input data to encode into the barcode.

company_prefix.description: The company prefix required for generating the barcode.

lot.description: The lot number to include in the barcode. Defaults to 'AB123'.

qty.description: The quantity to include in the barcode. Defaults to '100'.

name: countries_list
description: Returns a list of countries where Asos supports selling products.

lang.description: The language code for the country names. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: v1_textlanguage
description: Determines the language of a given text using the API Ninjas Text Language API.

text.description: The text for which the language needs to be identified.

name: app_news
description: Fetch the latest news for a specific app from the Steam API.

limit.description: The number of news articles to retrieve.

appid.description: The Steam app ID for which to fetch the news.

contentlength.description: The maximum length of the news content. Defaults to 300.

name: get_quotes_by_genre
description: Fetches a list of quotes for a given genre from the Quotsy API.

name.description: The name of the genre to fetch quotes for.

name: similar_hashtags
description: Fetches related hashtags for a given keyword using the Hashtag API.

keyword.description: The keyword for which related hashtags are to be fetched.

name: get_user_by_gender
description: Fetches user data based on the specified gender from the fake-users6 API.

gender.description: The gender of the users to be retrieved.

name: charts_chain
description: Retrieves the historical Total Value Locked (TVL) data for a specified blockchain chain.

chain.description: The slug identifier of the blockchain chain. This can be obtained from the /v1/tvl/chains endpoint or the chains property on /v1/tvl/protocols.

name: currency_time_series
description: Retrieve forex time series data for a specified period.

period.description: The period for which the time series data should be returned. Valid periods include:

to_symbol.description: A 3-letter currency code representing the target currency (ISO 4217).

from_symbol.description: A 3-letter currency code representing the base currency (ISO 4217).

language.description: The language code (ISO 639-1) for the results. Default is 'en'.

name: v1_animals
description: Queries the API Ninjas Animals API endpoint to return up to 10 results matching the input animal name.

name.description: The common name of the animal to search. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g., "fox" will match "gray fox" and "red fox").

name: single_country
description: Fetch all details of a country by its ID from the PageantDB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the country to retrieve details for.

name: get_a_conversation_turn
description: Fetch a specific conversation turn by its ID and return its details.

is_id.description: The ID of the conversation turn to fetch.

name: account_transaction_history
description: Gets an array of all transactions for a given address on the Binance Smart Chain.

address.description: The address to scan for transactions.

network.description: Specify the network to be used, either 'mainnet' or 'testnet'. Defaults to None.

name: getbystock
description: Fetches earnings data for a given stock symbol using the RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which earnings data is to be retrieved.

name: get_lexical_field
description: Retrieves the lexical field for a given word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which the lexical field is to be retrieved.

limite.description: The limit on the number of results to be retrieved (default is '20').

name: ticker_per_symbol
description: Fetch ticker data for a specified cryptocurrency symbol in a given market.

market.description: The market to retrieve data from. Possible values are: 'global' or 'local'.

symbol.description: The cryptocurrency symbol in the form of 'ETH<fiat>', where '<fiat>' is a valid ISO currency code (e.g., ETHUSD, ETHEUR).

name: hashtag_data_by_name
description: Fetches data for a specified TikTok hashtag using the given challenge name.

challenge_name.description: The name of the TikTok hashtag challenge to retrieve data for.

name: leagueplayersstatistics
description: Fetches player statistics for a specific Football league and season based on the given parameters.

limit.description: Number of players to include per page.

page.description: One-based page number.

seasonid.description: ID of the season to retrieve player statistics for.

tournamentid.description: Unique ID of the tournament to retrieve player statistics for.

minapps.description: If set to True, only includes players with a minimum number of appearances.

order.description: Sorting order of the response properties. Default is '-rating'. Prefix with '-' for descending order, leave as is for ascending.

filters.description: Filters to apply, such as player position, match type, appearances, age, preferred foot, team, and nationality. See the noisy docstring for detailed filter options.

accumulation.description: Type of accumulation. Choices are 'total', 'perGame', or 'per90'. Default is 'total'.

group.description: Statistic group to retrieve. Choices are 'summary', 'attack', 'defence', 'passing', 'goalkeeper'. Default is 'summary'.

fields.description: Specific fields to include, up to 6. Only used when not specifying a group. Field options include 'successfulDribblesPercentage', 'goals', 'blockedShots', etc.

name: list_of_memes
description: Fetches a list of memes based on the specified genre and type from the RapidAPI service.

genre.description: The genre of memes to retrieve. Default is 'memes'. Available genres include:

type.description: The type of memes to retrieve. Default is 'top'. Available types include:

name: matchodds
description: Retrieves the odds for a specific cricket match using the given match ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the cricket match for which to retrieve odds.

name: webcams_list_region_region_region
description: Fetch a list of webcams for the specified region(s) with optional parameters for language and content detail.

region.description: A comma-separated list of ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country codes and region codes separated by a dot.

lang.description: The language code to localize the results, if available. Default is 'en'.

show.description: Specifies the content details to include in the response. Default is 'webcams:image,location'.

name: movies_get_dvds
description: Fetches a list of DVDs based on the specified type of movie using the Flixster API.

typemovie.description: The type of movie to filter DVDs by. Can be one of the following: 'NEW_RELEASE' or 'COMING_SOON'. Default is 'NEW_RELEASE'.

name: get_global_stats
description: Fetches global statistics available on CoinRanking using the RapidAPI service.

name: google_fake_autocomplete
description: Generate a fake Google autocomplete suggestion using three input texts.

text1.description: The first text input for the autocomplete query.

text3.description: The third text input for the autocomplete query.

text2.description: The second text input for the autocomplete query.

name: get_5_history
description: Fetches historical stock data including open, high, low, close prices, and trading volume.

startdate.description: The start date for fetching historical data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Default is '2023-02-01'.

keyword.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch historical data. Default is 'GOOG'.

name: ayah_recitations
description: Fetches the list of recitations for a specific Ayah by its key and recitation ID.

ayah_key.description: The key of the Ayah, which is a combination of the Surah number and Ayah number (e.g., '1:1' for the first Ayah of the first Surah).

name: steps
description: Fetches a random selection of WikiHow steps.

description: Fetches upcoming CS:GO matches data from the specified API endpoint.

page.description: The page number to retrieve, default is 1.

limit.description: The number of matches to retrieve per page, default is 10.

name: listoforders
description: Fetches a list of orders from the marketplace API based on the given parameters.

token.description: Token for authentication with the API.

action.description: Action parameter specifying the type of request.

status.description: Status filter for the orders to be retrieved.

amount.description: The number of words to generate. Valid values are integers between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of the words. Valid values are "easy", "medium", and "hard". Default is 'easy'.

description: Retrieves global planet vector tiles in Protocolbuffer Binary Format (PBF) from the specified map service.

x.description: The x coordinate (tile column) of the map tile.

description: Fetch key statistics overview for a given stock performance ID.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock, which can be obtained from the /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.

name: get_individual_news_source_news
description: Gets news from an individual news source using the specified newspaper ID and API key.

name: us_ky
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Kentucky.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, current gas prices are returned.

name: density
description: Calculates the density of an object given its mass and volume.

name: aliexpress_store_item_search
description: Searches for items in an AliExpress store.

sort.description: The sorting order of the items. Default is None.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Default is None.

pagesize.description: The number of items to display per page. Default is None.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and content in the selected language. Default is None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price in. Default is None.

description: Predicts the y-value for a given x-value using linear regression.

y_values.description: The y-coordinates of the data points.

target_x.description: The x-value for which to predict the y-value.

name: remove_duplicates
description: Removes duplicate elements from a list while preserving the order.

name: get_date_and_time_by_city
description: Get the current date and time for a specified city.

name: url

description: Fetches a list of trending coins from the Crypto Gem Finder API.

limit.description: The number of results to return per page. Defaults to '10'.

name: get_from_eztv

countrycode.description: The country code where the product is available.

productid.description: The unique identifier for the product.

languagecode.description: The language code for the response. Default is 'en'.

name: users
description: Fetch all users from the specified API endpoint.

connection_string.default: the code gotten from the web

name: map_image_get
description: Fetches a static map image for a specified location with given parameters such as width, height, center, and zoom level.

width.description: Width of the map image. Must be between 1 and 999.

center.description: The center coordinates of the map (latitude,longitude).

zoom.description: The zoom level of the map. Must be between 6 and 19.

height.description: Height of the map image. Must be between 1 and 999.

datum.description: The geodetic system to use. Defaults to 'wgs84'. Options are:

coord_unit.description: The unit of latitude and longitude in the output data. Defaults to 'degree'. Options are:

description: Translates text from one language to another using the Bidirectional Text Language Translation API. Languages should be specified using two-character ISO codes. If the source language is not provided, it will be auto-detected.

text.description: The source text to be translated.

lang_to.description: The ISO code of the target language.

lang_from.description: The ISO code of the source language. If not provided, the source language will be auto-detected.

description: Fetches Eredivisie standings for a given season using the RapidAPI service.

season.description: The season for which to fetch the standings, e.g., '2022'. Defaults to None.

description: Retrieves 6 months of historical daily stock prices for the given ticker, including adjusted Open, High, Low, and Close prices, as well as Daily Volume, Dividend, and Split information.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return. Defaults to 100.

offset.description: Number of records to skip from the beginning. Defaults to 0.

name: extract

name: t3ma
description: Fetches the Triple Exponential Moving Average (T3MA) for a given financial instrument.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported intervals include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', and '1month'.

format.description: Format of the response data, either 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'json'.

v_factor.description: Volume factor used in the calculation of the T3MA.

series_type.description: Type of series to use in the calculation. Supported values are 'open', 'high', 'low', and 'close'. Default is 'close'.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Default is 30.

time_period.description: Number of periods over which to calculate the T3MA. Default is 9.

name: historical
description: Fetches historical exchange rates for a given date.

yyyy_mm_dd.description: The date for which historical rates are to be fetched, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

to.description: Comma-separated list of target currencies for which exchange rates are desired. The default is 'EUR,USD'.

is_from.description: The base currency from which to get the exchange rates. The default is 'CHF'.

name: getrandomuser
description: Fetches random user data such as name, e-mail, etc., from the specified API.

name: simple

description: Fetch driving directions from an origin to a destination.

origin.description: The starting point specified as a free-text location query or latitude, longitude pair.
origin.default: Church St & 29th St, San-Francisco, CA, USA

destination.description: The destination specified as a free-text location query or latitude, longitude pair.

avoid_routes.description: Route types to avoid, specified as a comma-delimited list (e.g., 'tolls,ferries').

country.description: The country or region to use for the query, specified as a 2-letter country code.

arrival_time.description: Arrival time specified as a Unix-Timestamp in destination local time

language.description: The language to use for the query, specified as a 2-letter language code.

departure_time.description: Departure time specified as a Unix-Timestamp in origin local time

distance_units.description: The distance units in the response ('auto', 'km', 'mi'). Default is `None`, which

name: software_assets
description: Fetch details of SaaS/Software tools based on specified feature tags or software name.

q.description: Query string representing the list of feature tags or the name of the software for which details are to be fetched.

name: city_list
description: Fetches a list of valid cities for a given province using the Canadian Gas Prices API.

province.description: The name of the province for which to fetch the list of cities.

name: timezone
description: Fetches the timezone information for a given geographic coordinate and timestamp using the RapidAPI service.

timestamp.description: The desired time as seconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinate.

name: driving_directions
description: Fetches driving directions and routes between specified source and destination coordinates using the Waze/Google API.

source_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the starting point.

destination_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the destination.

return_route_coordinates.description: Whether to return the route coordinate pairs. Defaults to None.

arrival_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the desired arrival time. Defaults to None, which returns directions for the current time.

name: get_latest_quote
description: Fetch the latest real-time quote for a given trading symbol.

tradingsymbol.description: The trading symbol for which to fetch the latest quote. Check the list of all supported trading symbols at [https://stockseyes.com/group/all](https://stockseyes.com/group/all).

description: Converts a given volume from one unit to another using the RapidAPI Unit Conversion API.

number.description: The numerical value of the volume to be converted.

is_from.description: The unit of the volume to be converted from.

name: all_songs_from_artist
description: Retrieves all songs by the specified artist using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

name: spac_sec_filings

name: aliexpress_item_search

startprice.description: The lower price limit to filter items by. Defaults to None.

region.description: The region to get accurate shipping costs and promotions. Defaults to None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product prices in. Defaults to None.

name: teamdetails

limite.description: The maximum number of synonyms to return. Defaults to '10'.

limit.description: The maximum number of tweets and replies to fetch. Defaults to '40'.

language.description: The language code for the response. One of the following: 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'. Defaults to 'en'.

name: image_to_text_ocr
description: Extracts text from an image using the Google Lens OCR API and provides detailed detections at the paragraph, sentence, and word levels.
